text: Look up the latest papers on neuro-symbolic reasoning and give me key takeaways.
Summarize this architecture proposal into three bullet points.
What did we decide yesterday about external memory size?
Draft a concise response explaining why MANN helps with long context.
Create a step-by-step roadmap to train a compact world model chatbot.
Find benchmark results for Dreamer-v3 in dialogue settings.
Condense the meeting notes into one paragraph for the team.
Remind me which tokenizer we picked for the BERT baseline.
Write an answer comparing ACT-R and SOAR for our use case.
Plan the experiment matrix for ablations on memory slots and depth.
Can you gather sources about predictive coding networks?
Give me the short version of this long training report.
Which loss function did we use in run_17?
Compose a polished project update for stakeholders.
Lay out milestones for integrating a symbolic reasoning layer.
